AIJA Membership

AIJA is the only global association devoted to lawyers and in-house counsel aged 45 and under. Since 1962 AIJA provides outstanding international opportunities for young lawyers to network, learn and develop.

Become a member

Choose the membership that is best for you

Individual Membership

AIJA is the only global association devoted to lawyers and in-house counsel aged 45 and under...

Find out more

Collective Membership

National, regional and local associations/bars of lawyers and corporate counsel. Firms do not qualify for collective membership...

Find out more

Future Lawyers

Are you still studying law? Do you dream to become a lawyer, defend the rule of law and join a unique international community? Join AIJA now to prepare your future professional success...

Find out more

Download the brochure and find out all the benefits you get as a future AIJA member...

AIJA is committed to handling Personal data in compliance with applicable data protection laws, including as of 25 May 2018, the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”).
If you have any questions, please contact us at myprivacy@aija.org.
